abstract: General Electric said Tuesday it has entered into an $8 billion joint venture with Abu Dhabi investment agency Mubadala Development with an initial focus on providing commercial finance in the Middle East and Africa. The two companies also plan to work together in the clean energy and water, aviation, and oil and gas sectors.
lead_paragraph: General Electric said Tuesday it has entered into an $8 billion joint venture with Abu Dhabi investment agency Mubadala Development with an initial focus on providing commercial finance in the Middle East and Africa. The two companies also plan to work together in the clean energy and water, aviation, and oil and gas sectors.

headline.main: G.E. and Abu Dhabi to Form $8 Billion Fund
